reviewText: This tale is more like the real Grizzly Adams, more so then the Dan Haggerty version. Mr. Adams isn't wanted in this movie. Mr Adams. is played by the man that did most of Dan's stunts in Tv series, The Life and Times of Grizzly Adams! Mr. Gene Edwards. So yes, he does look a lot like Mr. Haggerty. This movie is a must, if You love a family friendly movie! I loved it, I think You will as well. Regards!

Gene Edwards is as gentle in life as the man he portrays in THE LEGEND OF GRIZZLY ADAMS. This is a good family film to share. Times have changed but the value of being a kind and considerate person have not.
